Leap Motion | San Francisco | Full-Time | ONSITE or REMOTE

Leap Motion is seeking junior and senior engineers with experience in areas such as hardware, systems engineering, software engineering, machine learning, computer vision, cloud infrustructure, data engineering and graphics / game development.

Interested? Feel free to reach out directly at dholz at leapmotion.com
